item.description:
At our Meetup, we'll certainly discuss Job Fair development. I'll tell you about the Sustainable Development Forum I went to, and the New England Wind Fund Solar Challenge I'm working on. And we'll go over any other events recently attended or upcoming.

Because this is a small venue limited to 10 people, I'm not allowing Maybes this time. We want to fill the spots with people who will actually attend. Thanks.

MBTA Red Line - Savin Hill. Walk 11 minutes to Fred's.
item.name: Late Feb. Meetup at Fred's
